experience: You and Ryan both know Raj Mukherjee, Jason Pierse, and 9 others
Ryan can introduce you to 18 people at Google

The Kudelski Group is a world leader in digital security and convergent media solutions for the delivery of digital and interactive content. Its technologies are used in a wide range of services and applications requiring access control and rights management to secure the revenue of content owners and service providers for digital television and interactive applications across broadcast, broadband and mobile delivery networks.  The Group is also a world leader in the area of access control and management of people or vehicles to sites and events.Responsibilities:•	Provide full-cycle recruitment for technology, legal, finance and all operational based positions for The Kudelski Group.•	Employ a consultative approach by executing sourcing strategies that ensure efficient and effective candidate pipelines are met for current and future staffing needs.•	Regularly utilize and evaluate diverse sourcing methods including, internet sites, blogs, linkedin.com, networking forums and employee referrals. •	Maintain accurate and well ordered documentation on all recruiting activities in compliance with company standards.•	Effectively coordinate with HR managers as well as with other colleagues in developing specific project based hiring requirements by creating suitable techniques.•	Display leadership skills by heading meetings with hiring managers and teams regarding the development of new recruitment strategies that will benefit the company and produce exceptional results.

IT staffing and project solutions leader in regional markets. Services include project-based solutions, assignment based contract personnel, managed services, management consulting, project leadership, professional search, and direct-hire recruitment for a broad range of information technology disciplines and platforms.Responsibilities:•	Worked within a small office environment assisting clients within multiple markets in the greater Los Angeles area in filling senior level IT positions.•	Sourced qualified candidates through SMCI’s HRMS system, job boards, networking & technical user groups, internet searches, trade magazines and journals.•	Assisted sales team with prospective new clients and potential leads for new business opportunities.•	Pre-screened candidates through face-to-face, phone and webcam interviews.•	Worked with Marketing to format and provide uniformity of candidate resumes using SMCI’s templates.•	Coordinated interview schedules between candidate and client.•	Administered technical testing to gauge skill set and knowledge level.•	Focused on contract, contract-to-hire and direct hire positions with a multitude of clients ranging from Financial Services, Automotive, ASP’s, Engineering, Manufacturing, Medical, Insurance, IT Software Design and Utilities.

HR Advisors provides scalable staffing solutions to companies of any size. They provide clients with an alternative to standard contingency and retained agency fees by utilizing one or more recruiters on an hourly basis. They offer the flexibility of either long or short-term assignments.Responsibilities:•	Hired as a recruiting consultant assigned to various clients as needed, typically providing an alternate solution for clients looking at hiring via staffing agencies or contract recruiters.•	Provided full-cycle, onsite staffing solutions – most notably for Yodlee.com (2 years onsite), Symantec (6 months onsite) & IndyMac Bank (4 months onsite).•	Positions filled: Java Developers/Architects, Unix Systems Administrators, Network Administrators, QA, Integration Engineers, Cisco Network Architects, Solutions Engineers, Interaction Designers, UI Developers, etc.

Responsibilities:•	Hired as the sole Technical Recruiter/Staffing Manager for this start-up B2B firm.•	Managed the entire recruitment lifecycle from writing job descriptions, running ads, sourcing, screening, interview scheduling all the way through offer extension & onboarding.•	Positions filled: Sr. Java Developers, Systems Architects, Project Managers, Product Managers, QA, etc.

Adecco TAD Technical is a leading provider of permanent and contract engineering and technical employment solutions. Responsibilities:•	Provide IT staff augmentation, direct hire and consulting services solutions to fortune 500, mid-sized and start-up clientele within the greater Los Angeles market.•	Manage all business aspects of the sales cycle from initial contact through needs analysis, sales presentations, rate/salary negotiations and daily account management.•	Form strong relationships with clients to fully understand their working environments from a technical perspective as well as a cultural perspective.•	Communicate the specified requirements to the internal recruiting team•	Worked with all levels of management to provide staffing to positions such as (but not limited to: Software Engineer, Network Engineer, Systems Administrator, Project Manager, Product Manager, Helpdesk, DBA, Business Analyst, etc.

He really has a knack for matching the right "person" for the job and not just bring a stack of resumes with the appropriate key words.  I have been very happy with Ryan and he has been an critical component in our success.

summary: Top performing recruiting professional with over 15 years of corporate and agency experience.  Self-motivated, dynamic communicator offering high-powered sourcing, recruiting and client relationship skills.  Strict adherence to process driven recruiting.  Well-versed in creative sourcing and networking, candidate qualification and hiring processes. Rapid and consistent sourcing for both direct-hire and contract resources.  Highly skilled user of Applicant Tracking Systems for consistent product delivery.  Clarity for understanding complex business situations and devising simplified recruitment strategies.  Recruiting ProcessConduct in-depth interview with hiring manager to discuss hiring needs / objectives.  Develop technical qualifiers pertinent to each search, used as a qualifying tool to identify key talent.  Coordinate weekly recruiting meetings with hiring managers providing progress updates.  Manage and drive entire interview process while understanding candidate’s career objectives.  Identify and recruit passive candidates.  Possess excellent negotiating and closing skills with the ability to manage, negotiate, prepare and extend entire offer package.  Perform reference checks on final candidates.Professional AttributesOrganized, motivated and self-directed, Detailed and results oriented, Works well within a team or independently, Possess excellent people and presentation skills, Passion for developing and maintaining relationships with: Client and candidates, long after the recruiting process, Established proven reputation of competence, excellent follow up and trust with clients and candidates by building strong relationships. Demonstrated a high level of professionalism, loyalty, dedication and a solid work ethic, while employing a streamlined and enjoyable recruiting process.
name: Ryan Lunsford
title: Senior Corporate Recruiter at The Kudelski Group (Nagra-Kudelski Security-SKIDATA)
